title: QoS setup help.
body:
Simply put, I need help setting up a QoS ruleset for League of Legends.

https://i.imgur.com/vkJeRaO.png

Thanks in advance!

replies.body:
We can't really provide too much guidance on setting up your QoS, since it might ruin the rest of the connection to the internet. :/

My best suggestion would be reach out to your ISP and they can help you directly.
